评论详情: Love that is 100% cotton I like this style better than the new dresses this company is making similar to this one.
I absolutely love this dress. It's my favorite of all the ones I have, and I ordered it in two other patterns besides this one. I ordered XXL, I am 5 ft 2 and weigh 185 lb

评论概述: Long, and roomy in the bust area
评论详情: I purchased this dress in light blue w flowers, and what I received was a purple-blue color w flowers. Which I like better!!  I am 5’2” and 122 lbs, very much rectangular shaped. The dress is  beautiful, with pockets, and comfortable. I am concerned abt washing instructions: lay flat to dry.  Hmm, that’s not convenient for me. I am also worried abt the length as I will need to hem it, and possibly take in the sides in the bust area (or add a piece of elastic in back) as it’s too big on top. So, all these things are a bit much to deal with to make the dress functional; I’m still considering sending it back.
Loved the color and design, but especially that it had pockets! ;)
Love this dress!  The fabric is great.  The colors are beautiful.  It has lasted wash after wash.
I love this dress. I get compliments on it.
Love the dress but there are NO pockets. And there is a little flap over the bussom that keeps hiking up and I always have to correct it.
Adorable fit and style! And the color and pattern are so charming! I feel so put together and comfortable in this dress!
Love it!! Can dress up or down!!
Very nice.
Love it!
Fresco, lindo, suave y con tiras ajustables, nos encantó. Mi mamá y yo lo usamos ya que somos de la misma talla y nos encantó, super bonito. Ya lo tenemos hace más de 3 años, tela de buena calidad.

评论概述: sizing is different from dress to dress
评论详情: Loved the first one I purchased--super comfy.  I purchased a second dress in a different pattern--same size--and the second dress was almost two inches longer! Boooo.
This is a pretty dress. Longer than I thought it would be. I'm 5'6. Had to hem It about 3 inches. Nice fabric,good color.

The fabric is a little better (thicker) than last years. The colors are better in person! I get so many compliments!! It's so comfortable and easy to wash and dry. I purchased 2 sizes above my usual and it's just roomy and flowing.
Nice looking dress, good quality material, however, I returned as it didn't look good on my body type.  Wish it would have worked out, great price for a summer dress.

Love the dress pattern and fabric, its flow. Fabric has nice feel, not sheer, but no stretch at all. I wear 2-3X and ordered a 2X as 3x was not available. It's wearable at home in a pinch, but bodice very tight, no give. Will be holding until I loose some weight this summer.

This is a cute dress , summer fun fashion , love the print and vibrant  colors . Fits nice , feels , comfy, fabric just right for warm summer days and fun nights.  Cannot go wrong with this dress.Im 5’5” and 140 , medium fits just right, but if you are bigger in the bust it will be tight !
Runs a little small through the chest
This is a pretty summer dress.  It’s not see through.  The straps are adjustable.  This will be comfortable to wear in the summer heat. I just wish it had pockets.
Fabric seems comfortable however it is smaller than id expect 3x to be
Not like the picture fabric very stiff.
So synthetic! Nothing good about this material. Cheap. Cheap. Cheap.
Soft flowy, comfortable. Fits well. Flattering even on plus size frame
Love this little dress. Still fits great even after washing.  Pairs great with a black shrug or Blue jean jacket.

My favorite summer dress! Everytime i wear this dress i get compliments. It flows softly and the print is fun. I pare it with a black cargigan crop sweater. I have since, my first purchase, bought several other with different prints and recieve the same response from people.
It was a cute dress, which I purchased in my normal size, however, it was so tight in the chest area that even with a minimizer bra, there’s no way I could wear it.
Enjoy wearing this dress, light weight fabric, washes easy, no iron needed.
Loose fit cool in summer. Will wear for a second season. Artistic print in pleasant hues. Comfortable and useful for many occasions

评论用户: Very convenient organizer, saves a lot of space, I wish I could buy a bigger one.

Está precioso me quedo muy bien excelente felicidades
The dress is beautiful. I wish it was a little wider at rhe top across the bosoms. . Very snug there but everywhere else its perfect.

Living in Fl and finding dresses that are flowy and comfortable for a size 14 big busted girl is somewhat of a challenge.  This dress is a win!  With a belt, it changes the dress from a throw on dress to a brunch, church, or night date dress.  Hoping new patterns come out.  Highly recommend.
Perfect beach dress
Dress was beautiful but didn't fit me properly I wish it had of because it was truly comfortable and material was really soft...
I am not sure this is the same dress I ordered. The color is not as sharp as it looks in the picture. Just a little disappointed but will not complain to much as I got it on sale.

This was my 3rd dress that I ordered, and I finally found The One! Perfect length (5'5), falls below the ankle but doesn't cover my feet. Great fit, roomy but not sloppy or frumpy. Lightweight fabric, but not see thru. Paired with a scalloped edge cardi, and I'm in love!

The bodice/top of the dress is too small. This dress will only work well on extremely flat-chested women. The material pattern is beautiful, but the dress is not super high quality. The quality looks like a novice sewing project—definitely not a “store-bought” quality. Returning it.

This is an awesome dress. I got a compliment on it at a resort in Puerto Vallarta last month. I wear it constantly at home. Two things... I wish the pockets were just a little bigger. And the straps are so slender that one of them pulled out at the back and I had to repair it. I think I stepped on the dress and put too much pressure on it though. Anyway, the fabric is pretty and durable, and it is probably my favorite casual summer dress.
El material y diseño está bonito queda bien  compré M peso 136 libras  5:4 alturaMe quedó perfecto. Compraría otros colores
This dress is perfect for the hot summer days. You can dress it up or wear it casual. It is so soft & comfortable!!!
It was too tight in the chest, but the fabric is really cute
This dress fits so well , got a small and large bought another with a different print , love it , I ‘ll wear it this Spring

评论概述: Really cute but small in the bust
评论详情: This dress is really cute & comfortable, however it is small in the bust. I bought a size large & I'm a full C cup & it squished my chest down. It should have been elastic in the back to accommodate different chest sizes.
Tela muy fresca. Muy bonito
Very flattering on me. I like this dress very much!
I love this dress but prewarning it is not true to size. I am 5'9" and weigh 262. I would normally wear 3x but on this afternoon 3 tries found the 1x fit perfect.
I purchased this and it fit well but because I am too heavy the fit was a bit off.  I ended up returning it

评论概述: Can wear a bra without being seen, straps are wide enough

I loved  the color and the fabric . Runs a little bigger than expected, but I managed 😍
me encanto
I really liked this dress…but…after the second wash and hang dry, one of the seams came completely undone.

I have 6 or 7 of these dresses. They are my absolute favorite to wear. Soft cotton, perfect for my sensory issues…lovely prints, I can wear them casual or dress them up a bit for work. I like them oversized so I order them a little big

评论详情: I prefer the old design that has no pockets but it's lose and airy and I can wear it with nothingvunder
Fits beautifully

I love these dresses so much I bought 4 or 5 of them.  Living in the south, they are my summer uniform.  100% cotton, light, floaty, airy, and POCKETS!  I really don’t need one in every pattern, but I guess I could if I wanted to, because they’re so affordable.  And machine wash & dry — what more could you ask for?

Love this dress!  Very well made and striking!
Nice dress. Thanks

Super comfy, love the material and adjustable straps
It fit perfect
Beyond what was expected! Wonderful

The dress arrived as expected. It fits perfectly. I am 5ft. 4 in. 134 lbs. I bought a small. The material is very light weight and great for the hot summer days. I wear it with a white t-shirt. Some of you would probably prefer not to. The color is not as bright as  you see on the picture but still very pretty. I have four of these dresses in different colors.
The size is tight in the bust, so if you like more room size up. It will not matter for the rest of the dress as it flows nice. Thus can be dressed up or anytime you want to feel all put together.
This dress I wore on my Vacation in Jamaica and I got so many compliments!!
VERY LONG I'M 5' 1"
Very nice fit, good fabric and print!  Lovely dress for many different occasions. 💞💯
came to my house just fine.

评论概述: Long length, generous size except bustline
评论详情: Unless you’re almost flat chested you’ll need a compression sport bra to wear this dress

评论概述: Buy this now but please leave me some
评论详情: what a beautiful dress!  I buy inexpensive clothing which means I often am purchasing odd materials. This dress reminded me how beautiful cotton is! I got the navy blue, and I love it paired with a denim jacket as the weather is cooling. It is not clingy, it is airy and perfect. The straps give you a lot of control of the look/length.  I am going back in for more. Plus size girlies  - I swear this is your jam!
Loved the dress but had to return. It was too large
The stress is lightweight has pockets and is an excellent summer dress
Item says 100% cotton on the tag but there's no way this dress is cotton. It doesn't feel like any type of cotton clothing I've ever bought, and it smells of chemicals
Fabric is soft and pattern delightful. Fits in all the right spots.  Please to wear on a winter cruise to the islands.

Looks best with a short sleeved t-shirt underneath. Bodice seems to be cut wide up under the arms. A quick tuck with the sewing machine remedied this. If you are not an experienced seamstress and you’re wearing this to a wedding…order early enough you can take it to a tailor to be adjusted.
This dress is made for small chested women, with stiff fabric that wrinkles like crazy!
I like the color, pattern and fit of this dress.  I just ordered a 2nd dress in pink.
Just love this dress! So comfy. Love the pockets and it fit really well. The adjustable straps were a nice feature. I received many compliments on how pretty it was.
Bought two in different colors.
I love this dress, it’s not high quality and I think it’s slightly over priced, but the dress is very cute, not see through and perfect for these hot summer days . True to size

评论概述: Side seam had a large rip the first time I wore it.
评论详情: I sized up, based on reviews, and it was too big. I would say, this pattern, runs true to size. It is a beautiful and comfortable dress, but I wore it for the first time, yesterday, and looked down to see a large gap where the side seam had unraveled. Very disappointed! Unfortunately, I had already ordered a different pattern and size before noticing this. I'm not sure if I will keep the one that's coming, because I don't want to be wearing it and have the same thing happen.

Cute but buyer beware the sizing is inconsistent and the craftsmanship is “meh”… The first one I purchased was too tight around my chest, the second had a strap that was sewn incorrectly and The third was too large around my chest. Also, some come with pockets and some do not, despite the fact that they are all the same style.

Perfect for me! I wear a tshirt under for modesty or a jacket with it. It can be dressed up or down & I love that! Comes to right above my ankles & I'm around 5'6". Very nice material & NOT see through at all. I am already wanting to try another color or two!
Like the dress, very comfortable loose. Received lots of compliments Will buy other colors. I like the material as well.

I bought three of these in different patterns. They’re light weight and very flattering. I’m not sure how well they would hold up to being washed in the machine, so I took them to the cleaners. New favorites.
Did not know needed to iron after washing but like the dress
The fit was great with easily adjustable straps. Wonderful quality fabric. I am so pleased.
Love the adjustable straps

I have bought several dresses and I haven’t been disappointed in any of them really great for summer. If you’re going out to dinner or just out to wear one and the material is very good there’s nothing bad I can say about these dresses. They are so cute and may very well and they don’t shrink all up after you wash them.
I would recommend this dress but size up, sister! It isn’t top heavy friendly but it is cute!!
This dress is well made, and so cute. I bought it to wear over bathing suit on vacation.  Could definitely be worn out for a casual dinner.
Cotton/no stretch Pretty but too small across chest
Cute dress. Fits well. Not yellow at all. Very mustard. Overall darker than pic. Nice length. Il 5'6".
